    1 Year Servify Care Total Protection Plan

    from Service Lee Technologies Pvt. Ltd
    (14)
    • Total Protection Plan is offered by Service Lee Technologies Private Limited - 1 Year Manufacturing defects and Accidental + Liquid Damage Protection, Free On-site repair, Repair by Authorised Repair Centers, No hidden charges, Complete paperless Process. Protect you device from adhoc repair expenses.
    • Does not cover theft or loss, wear and tear and unauthorized repair of the Laptop. Renewed/refurbished device & plan purchased separately will not be covered.
    • Plans are only valid when purchased together with eligible new products purchased on Amazon. Manufacturing defects and Accidental + Liquid Damage Protection Effective from date of purchase of Device to 1 Year.
    • The plan will be automatically Activated within 10 days of the Plan Purchase. Plans are only valid when purchased together with eligible new products purchased on Amazon.
    • How to raise a claim - Schedule a service at your convenience from your Amazon account itself by navigating to Your Orders section in your Amazon account > go to the product order > click on Get Product Support > schedule an appointment. We will arrange for a technician to visit at your home. Get full visibility on the status at any point on your Amazon account itself. We use genuine parts, and engage 100% background verified experts.
    Learn more

    Quess Care Extended Warranty Plan for 2 Year for Laptop Between 60001 to 70000 (Email Delivery)

    from Quesscare
    (59)
    • Validity : Quess Care 2 Year Extended Warranty Plan is applicable for Laptop with 1 Year or 2 Year Manufacturing Warranty. Extended warranty starts from the date when the manufacturer’s warranty ends.
    • What's covered : Manufacturing defects in your product which is part of the original product brand warranty.
    • For your comfort : (a) Digital WhatsApp delivery within 10 days (b) Auto-Activation (c) Complimentary Pickup and Drop (d) Unlimited service requests.
    • Remain stress free : (a) File claims through Amazon (b) Brand authorized technicians and genuine parts (c) 15 days’ repair or replacement or refund up to sum insured value with Policy T&C, How to claim : 1 : Go to Your Orders - Get Product Support - File Claim. 2 : Go to quesscare.com - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 3 : Download - QUESSCare App - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 4 : Call 1-800-5721-144 for any support
    • Our Service Standards : 98.22% claim settlement ratio, 15 days to settle claims, 85% customer satisfaction. What's not covered : (a) damages (b) wear and tear (c) theft (d) accessories (e) anything that is not covered within the brand warranty. Disclaimer : This plan is auto-activated and valid only if purchased along with the product on Amazon, this plan cannot be exercised standalone.
    Learn more

    1 Year Extended Warranty

    from Acko
    (361)
    • What's covered - electrical and mechanical failures covered under original manufacturer’s warranty
    • Validity - Valid for 12 months after comprehensive manufacturer warranty has expired
    • Schedule a repair with just one click, no paperwork, no calls, no stress
    • Log on to Acko.tech to schedule a repair
    • What's not covered - Wear and tear and additional elements of an appliance apart from the main unit, are not a part of the cover
    • We will arrange a technician visit at home
    • Enjoy completely cashless repair
    • Your plan details will be delivered via email and not shipped to you. It will come from Acko Technology & Services Private Limited within 15 days of purchase
    • Acko Extended Warranty plans are only valid when purchased together with eligible new electronic products purchased on Amazon
    • No activation or app download required. The plan is not valid for any refurbished products or if purchased standalone
    Learn more

    Free Delivery
    The product is eligible for Free delivery. Learn more

    7 days Replacement

    Replacement Reason Replacement Period Replacement Policy
    Defective,
    Physical Damage,
    Wrong and Missing Item     		7 days from delivery Replacement
    We will need you to submit proof of issue to verify your replacement request.

      • Defective: Verification by Brand or Amazon, through on-call support followed by inspection at your location or nearest brand service center if required.

      • Physical Damage, Wrong, Missing Items: Remote verification by Amazon.
      Know More

      Replacement Instructions

      Keep the item in its original condition and packaging along with MRP tag and accessories for a successful pick-up.

      Replacement verification

      During on-call support, you may be prompted to download a diagnostic app or upload an image for verification. Depending on your location, further inspection may be done either at your doorstep or at nearest brand service centre. Final resolution may take up to 7 days. Find out more
      Read full returns policy
      1 Year Warranty
      1 Year Onsite Hardware Service
      Top Brand
      Top Brand indicates high quality, trusted brands on Amazon aggregated basis verified ratings, returns/refunds and recent order history at brand level.
      Services Available
      Service support is available with the product to make it ready to use. Service applicable on the product can be availed on the product detail page or during checkout. For Brand provided services, we will notify the brand once the product is delivered. Brand will subsequently contact to you to schedule the service. For paid services by Brands like AC installation the charges need to be paid directly to the brand technician we will initiate the request on your behalf

      All services are listed below
      • Free installation and demo on Televisions. **Installation at the time of delivery available in select pincodes View details.Wall mount brackets are chargeable if not included in the box along with the TV
      • Free Phone set-up service at the time of delivery is available in select regions. This can be availed during checkout by selecting a time slot that mentions "with setup".View details
      • Free installation on Washing Machines and Refrigerator
      • Paid Installations for Air Conditioners and Chimneys. For Brand provided AC installations, service charges will have to be paid to the brand technician directly
      • Free assembly services for Furniture items requiring professional assembly
      • Paid set-up service on Laptops and SSD
      • Installation/Assembly &/or Set-up services are also available on Dishwashers, Security cameras, Cycles, Inverters, Soundbars
      • Automotive support: Tyre installation, Engine oil change, Brake disk replacement etc. available in select pincodes
      Learn more
      Service support is available along with product purchase for your convenience.

      Many Brands provide the service themselves. For brand provided services we register a service request with the brand once the product is delivered. There might be additional charges in some cases for the services availed. Read more on Brand provided services
      Amazon Delivered
      Amazon directly manages delivery for this product. Order delivery tracking to your doorstep is available.
      Your transaction is secure
      We work hard to protect your security and privacy. Our payment security system encrypts your information during transmission. We don’t share your credit card details with third-party sellers, and we don’t sell your information to others. Learn more

      What is in the box?

    • ‎‎‎User Manual, Laptop, Charger & Adapter

      • Looking for specific info?

      See questions and answers

      From the manufacturer

      Vostro 5625

      See more of the big picture on the new Vostro 5625 laptop. Features AMD Ryzen 5000 Series Processors and more screen space with a 16:10 aspect ratio display.

      • 16.0" FHD+ WVA AG Narrow Border 60 Hz 250 nits with Compfort View Display
      • AMD Ryzen R5-5625U (2.30 GHz, 4.30 GHz 6-core/12-thread) Processor
      • AMD Radeon Graphics
      • 512 GB Solid State Drive
      • 8GB DDR4 Memory

      Big screen. Major reliability.

      A 16:10 aspect ratio in a 16-inch form factor means even more screen space for reviewing spreadsheets, purchase orders and perfecting presentations, all in a slim, lightweight design.

      Mistakes happen. That’s why this full size keyboard is spill resistant. And, this laptop passed 15 military certification tests (MIL-810H) to help ensure it can handle the day-to-day wear and tear.

      Based on testing by SGS Reliability Laboratory, December 2021. Actual results may vary; testing results do not performance under test conditions. Dell does not represent that this product meets United States Department of Defense requirements for military use.

      Windows 11 brings you closer to what you love

      Family, friends, obsessions, music, creations. Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next.

      Be more productive

      Run at peak performance with AMD Ryzen 5000 Series Processors. If you’re doing some graphics-heavy work, AMD Radeon Graphics give you the added performance you need. And with dual heat pipes, your device stays cool and performing at its best.

      Stay focused with a 4-sided narrow border and DC Dimming, which reduces flicker for a comfortable viewing experience. Plus, this laptop with Dell ComfortView software technology helps reduce harmful blue light emissions to optimize eye comfort over extended screen time.

      Stay secure

      The Trusted Platform Module 2.0 is a commercial-grade security chip installed on the motherboard that creates and stores passwords and encryption keys. It verifies that the computer has not been tampered with before booting up and protects your data against external software attacks.

      Get added peace-of-mind with the fingerprint reader that allows you to securely log in with a touch, while a mechanical shutter on the camera protects your privacy and prevents accidental embarrassments.

      Conference with clarity

      Sound as clear as a phone call with built in dual mic and AI that reduces background noise. When you’re on camera, the new FHD webcam equipped with Wide Dynamic Range and Temporal Noise Reduction helps you look your best.

      Waves Maxx Audio tuned speakers and microphones optimize audio so you can hear and be heard with clarity, while Smartbyte prioritizes video traffic for a smoother conferencing experience.

      Ports and Slots

      1. SD Card reader | 2. USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A | 3. RJ-45 | 4. Headset jack | 5. Wedge shaped lock slot | 6. Power jack | 7. HDMI 1.4 | 8. USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A | 9. USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (DP/PowerDelivery)

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
